item.title: Introducing oars
item.description: The Motivation Behind oars For a while now, I have been working on a library called oars (orthogonal arrays rust). The need for this library was born out of the work we were doing on my Bachelor's thesis and related EGSR paper. The team and I were working on implementing orthogonal array construction methods, and using Art Owen's techniques to create point sets from these orthogonal arrays that are suitable for Monte Carlo integration.
